snippet: Senator Lindsey Graham of South Carolina, who might plunge into the already crowded pool of Republican presidential hopefuls, made a foray to Iowa this week to test the political strength of his signature issue: the threat from the Islamic State.
abstract: Senator Lindsey Graham of South Carolina, who might plunge into the already crowded pool of Republican presidential hopefuls, made a foray to Iowa this week to test the political strength of his signature issue: the threat from the Islamic State.

headline.main: In Iowa, Lindsey Graham Talks Up Threat From Islamic State

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
